From the Manufacturer

PowerLight Fairness Moisturiser SPF 15
Everyday your skin is attacked by daily aggressions exposure to sun and pollution that can cause intensive darkening and dark spots.
  • Garnier Men creates PowerLight: The 1st moisturiser for men with a fairness performance so intense that you can now measure it.
  • Intensive visible fairness performance from 1st application: Enriched with brightening lemon extract that helps remove dark dead cells it reveals visibly fairer and smoother skin immediately.
  • Measurable fairness performance day after day: Enriched with anti-pigmenting Long Dan which prevents production of skin-darkening melanin it delivers a fairness result you can measure while intensively reducing dark spots.

SPF 15 sun protection to prevent skin from dark spots and further darkening.

NOW GET FAIRNESS PERFORMANCE YOU CAN MEASURE !

Usage:
Apply twice daily on the whole face on perfectly cleansed skin. Avoid eye area. Fragment illustration of rulers used in test. Colours on scale could vary during print.

Garnier Men - Fuel your skin with natural energy.

Everyday life drains energy out of your skin. To stay fresh healthy and at its maximum strength your skin needs that extra-boost.

Garnier Men is a specific skincare range tailor-made for men with:
  • The proven power of ingredients of natural origin.
  • Fresh and light formulae adapted to men’s skin.
  • Proven efficacy.
  • Products tested and proven on Indian men.

Try the Garnier MenFace Wash Range:
  • Intense Fresh Face Wash : For an energising detoxifying action
  • Power Light Face Wash : For visibly fairer skin
  • Oil ClearFace Wash : For all day oil-free feel

Product Description

Garnier Men Power Light SPF 15 is enriched with lemon extract and anti pigmentation long dan extract that ensure measurable fairness.

column17:
Product Description

From the Manufacturer

Garnier Sun Control
Garnier Sun Control is an every day solution that moisturizes your skin and protects from UVA and UVB rays to help prevent skin darkening and premature ageing.

Its special formula blends a moisturizer with special ingredients:

Formula with Meroxyl SX to give protection from sun’s UV rays and Vitamin E to help protect against free radicals and help delay signs of ageing.

Glycerol and extract of coriander to retain the skin’s moisture and prevent it from drying while nourishing

How to use:
Gently massage into the skin using circular movements moving from the inside of your face outwards and from the base of your neck to the top.

It may be applied as often as required.

Product Description

Garnier Sun Control daily moisturizer helps prevent skin darkening and premature ageing.
